mapper.insert: insert into namuwiki(uid, song_id, singer_id, namu_title, namu_content, namu_date, namu_img) values(#{uid}, #{song_id}, #{singer_id}, #{namu_title}, #{namu_content}, now(), #{namu_img})
mapper.update: update namuwiki set is_delete=1 where uid=#{uid}
mapper.select: select count(*) from namuwiki where namu_id=#{namu_id} and uid=#{uid}
select * from namuwiki order by namu_date limit #{startList}, #{listSize}
select count(*) from namuwiki where namu_title like concat('%',#{word},'%')
select * from namuwiki where namu_title like concat('%',#{word},'%') order by namu_date limit #{startList}, #{listSize}
select count(*) from wordlike where uid=#{uid} and namu_id=#{namu_id}
select * from wordlike where namu_id=#{namu_id} and uid=#{uid}
mapper.delete: delete from wordlike where uid=#{uid} and namu_id=#{namu_id}
